commit message:
Merge pull request #4 from svetlemodry/master

Czech translation added
Implementation of issue #5. Chart items now depend on the size of display.
Dutch translations + minor updates of other translations.
Upgrade of build system to gradle 0.14.2
The history of notifications is now visible for each app separately for a day, week or month period.
Navigation drawer now has specific design for Holo and Material themes.
Implementation of ViewHolder pattern in ListViewAdapters
Layout inflating now happens with parent (Android Lint)
Fix in EnhancedListView library: position of PopUpWindow on Android 5.0.
Fix in EnhancedListView library: position of PopUpWindow on Android 5.0.
